Account.Description: Represents an individual account, which is an organization or person involved with your business (such as customers, competitors, and partners).

AccountHistory.Description: Represents the history of changes to the values in the fields of an account.

Contact.Description: Represents a contact, which is an individual associated with an account.

Lead.Description: Represents a prospect or potential opportunity, i.e., an individual who has shown interest in your product or service.

Opportunity.Description: Represents a sale or pending deal.

Case.Description: Represents a customer issue or problem.

Campaign.Description: Represents a marketing campaign, such as a direct mail or email campaign.

Task.Description: Represents a task that a user needs to perform.

Event.Description: Represents an event, such as a meeting or phone call.

Solution.Description: Represents a detailed description of a customer issue and the resolution of that issue.

User.Description: Represents a user in your organization.

Product.Description: Represents a product that your organization sells.

Pricebook.Description: Represents a book that lists the prices of products that your organization sells.

Quote.Description: Represents a quote, which is a record showing proposed prices for products and services.

Asset.Description: Represents an item of commercial value, such as a product sold by your organization.

Contract.Description: Represents a contract (a business agreement) associated with an Account.

Dashboard.Description: Represents a dashboard, which is a visual representation of key business metrics and performance indicators.

Document.Description: Represents a file that a user can upload and store in Salesforce.

Attachment.Description: Represents a file that a user can attach to a parent object record.

EventRelation.Description: Represents a relationship between an event and another object, such as a contact or lead.

FeedItem.Description: Represents a single feed item in a Chatter feed.

Note.Description: Represents a note that a user can attach to a parent object record.

Site.Description: Represents a website hosted on Salesforce.

PermissionSet.Description: Represents a set of permissions that can be assigned to users.

AccountContactRole.Description: Represents the role that a Contact plays on an Account.

Activity.Description: Represents a task or event in Salesforce.

CampaignMember.Description: Represents the association between a campaign and a lead or a contact.

CaseTeamMember.Description: Represents a member of a case team.

ContentDocument.Description: Represents a document that has been uploaded to a library in Salesforce CRM Content or Salesforce Files.

ContentDocumentLink.Description: Represents the link between a Salesforce CRM Content document or Salesforce file and where it's shared.

ContentFolder.Description: Represents a folder in Salesforce CRM Content.

ContentFolderLink.Description: Represents the link between a Salesforce CRM Content folder and where it's shared.

ContentVersion.Description: Represents a specific version of a Salesforce CRM Content document or Salesforce file.

ContractContactRole.Description: Represents the role that a Contact plays on a Contract.

Idea.Description: Represents an idea posted to the Ideas application.

IdeaComment.Description: Represents a comment on an idea.

KnowledgeArticleVersion.Description: Represents a specific version of a knowledge article.

OpportunityContactRole.Description: Represents the role that a Contact plays on an Opportunity.

Partner.Description: Represents a partner, such as a distributor or reseller.

PartnerRole.Description: Represents a role in the partner relationship.

Pricebook2.Description: Represents a price book that lists the prices of products that your organization sells.

PricebookEntry.Description: Represents an entry in a price book that lists the price of a product.

QuoteLineItem.Description: Represents a line item on a quote.

SiteDetail.Description: Represents detailed information about a site.

SolutionStatus.Description: Represents the status of a solution.

StaticResource.Description: Represents a static resource, such as a JavaScript or CSS file.

WorkOrderLineItem.Description: Represents a line item on a work order.
